item.title: Playing with the theme
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I've slowly started poking through the theme for my blog, I've gotten bored of the look of the place. I'm going to be adding new items I think folks will find useful, and that I'll find useful. Please excuse the dust and noise from the ongoing construction.
